text: Ɛda a Ɔbεboa wͻn nyinaa ano (aka sε): “Jinnifoͻ fekuo, ampa sε moayera nnipa no mu bebree’’ Wͻn ayͻnkofoͻ a wͻn wͻ nnipa no mu no bεka sε: ‘’Ye’Wura Nyankopͻn, yenyaa yεnho-yεnho mfasoͻ, na seesei deε yaduru yεn berε a Wohyε maa yεn no’’ Nyankopͻn bεka sε: ‘’Egya no mu na εbεyε mofiee na emu na mobεtena, gyesε Nyankopͻn pε. Nokorε sε wo Wura Nyankopͻn ne Onyansafoͻ, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ
